promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic basic serpent fire-type pokemon wearing a ruby mask. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or serpent. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Pyroconda, a a dynamic basic serpent fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: Fire Tackle, Moon-Watching Dance. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "serpent", "fire" or "Pyroconda". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, serpent-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lava texture background
generatedDescription: Infernal and agile, Pyroconda uses Fire Tackle to hunt prey in magma-rich domains. By night, it performs the Moon-Watching Dance, communicating with the lunar cycle.
